document_data.mainbody:
The Palace of the High King was a wondrous structure located in Caer Callidyrr on Alaron within the Moonshae Isles.
The spires of the Palace of the High King often stood above the clouds, making them easily visible for ships approaching Whitefish Bay.
The palace served as the seat of power for the High King of the Moonshae Isles.
